lead_paragraph: The London School of Economics has denied reports that the university is considering "going private" in response to the coalition government's plans to cut its contribution to university teaching budgets by as much as 40 percent, Reuters reports.
snippet: The London School of Economics has denied reports that the university is considering "going private" in response to the coalition government's plans to cut its contribution to university teaching budgets by as much as 40 percent.

headline.main: London School of Economics Denies It's Going Private

abstract: The London School of Economics has denied reports that the university is considering "going private" in response to the coalition government's plans to cut its contribution to university teaching budgets by as much as 40 percent.
